long_description: Use the Pro-Tec Athletics Roller massager to rub sore muscles and provide deep tissue stimulation. Raised Vynafoam(R) sections help you roll out tightness in soft muscle tissue. Rounded grip ends can be used to provide trigger point release. Use short strokes to target a specific knot or area of muscle tightness. Use long strokes for a general deep tissue massage over a large area. Includes a user's manual with 20 massage techniques.
short_description: Use the Pro-Tec Athletics Roller massager to rub sore muscles and provide deep tissue stimulation.
